name: Rick and Morty
overview: I’m Pixel Rick!!! Let’s get schwifty in this all new 8 bit adventure. Evil aliens have taken over the dimensions of each family member, and it’s up to Rick and Morty to stop them. They are sure to encounter some familiar faces, as they rescue the citizens of each dimension. Play as Rick, Morty, or team up with a friend to take down the alien scum. Grab a controller and Wubba Lubba Dub Dub
